this_title: So What?! - Friedrich Gulda: A portrait
trans_title: 还等什么？弗里德里希·古尔达：一个肖像！
introduction: So What?!(2002) - A film by Benedict Mirow and Fridemann LeipoldSolo Flight(1981) - A concert film with works by Bach, Shubert, Debussy, and GuldaMozart/Gulda - Sarastro's aria "In diesen heil'gen Hallen" from Die ZauberfloteBach - Prelude and Fugue in C sharp minor BWV 849Foderl/Marischka/Gulda - Die ReblausInterview with Joachim Kaiser(1986)
